#Conditions
 * Each graph has update function.
 * Update function of each node in each graph is saved in isSelectArr when initializing data.

#Sequence
 * Scatter
  * allGraphUpdate(common.js) -> call isSelect[id][graph_number](X)
 * Histogram
  * allGraphUpdate(common.js) -> getHasArray -> call isSelect[array_number][graph_number](X)
 * Parameter X is for selecting number (0 - select, 1 - unselect, 2 - hide, 3 - reset).
 * “HasArray” has data numbers which are in each histogram node.
